messages.content: Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in
I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter, because that is what free speech means
Comedy is now legal on Twitter
If I die under mysterious circumstances, it’s been nice knowin ya
The extreme antibody reaction from those who fear free speech says it all
For Twitter to deserve public trust, it must be politically neutral, which effectively means upsetting the far right and the far left equally
Twitter DMs should have end to end encryption like Signal, so no one can spy on or hack your messages
Trash me all day, but it’ll cost $8
I love when people complain about Twitter … on Twitter 🤣🤣
The far left hates everyone, themselves included!
Chocolate milk is insanely good. Just had some.

Since I’ve been asked a lot:

Buy stock in several companies that make products & services that *you* believe in.

Only sell if you think their products & services are trending worse. Don’t panic when the market does.

This will serve you well in the long-term.
Biden’s mistake is that he thinks he was elected to transform the country, but actually everyone just wanted less drama
To all complainers, please continue complaining, but it will cost $8
@AOC Your feedback is appreciated, now pay $8
Wasn’t Twitter supposed to die by now or something … ?
Those who want power are the ones who least deserve it

The people have spoken. 

Trump will be reinstated.

Vox Populi, Vox Dei.
If I had a dollar for every time someone asked me if Trump is coming back on this platform, Twitter would be minting money!
My 14-year-old son, Saxon, said he feels like 2021 will be a good year. I agree. Let us all make it so.
This is a battle for the future of civilization. If free speech is lost even in America, tyranny is all that lies ahead.
Sometimes it’s just better to make pizza at home
Changed my name to Mr. Tweet, now Twitter won’t let me change it back 🤣
You can now buy a Tesla with Bitcoin
If our twitter bid succeeds, we will defeat the spam bots or die trying!
Also, I’m buying Manchester United ur welcome

By “free speech”, I simply mean that which matches the law. 

I am against censorship that goes far beyond the law. 

If people want less free speech, they will ask government to pass laws to that effect.

Therefore, going beyond the law is contrary to the will of the people.

In the past I voted Democrat, because they were (mostly) the kindness party.

But they have become the party of division & hate, so I can no longer support them and will vote Republican.

Now, watch their dirty tricks campaign against me unfold … 🍿

If you were unfairly treated by your employer due to posting or liking something on this platform, we will fund your legal bill.

No limit. 

Please let us know.
The Twitter Files on free speech suppression soon to be published on Twitter itself. The public deserves to know what really happened …
The bots are angry at being counted 🤣

But I’m no fan of the far right either. 

Let’s have less hate and more love.
And be my love in the rain
@FedorovMykhailo Starlink service is now active in Ukraine. More terminals en route.
If there’s ever a scandal about me, *please* call it Elongate
